title: How to get fontographer to work in xp??
content:
Hello,

Years ago I installed Fontographer for windows xp. Since rebuilding my system I have started over from scratch. I keep getting the out of memory message when i start fontographer. I remember editing some numbers, not the virtual memory. Does anyone know how to fix this?

Thanks and much appreciated.

-Chuck Borges

comments.content:
I run Fog fine on my XP-Home, but for some reason the fan (it’s a laptop) kicks into hyperdrive and stays there as long as Fog is running...

hhp
Did you have to change your virtual memory or anything like that?

No, because it ran as-is. I use FontLab more now, so I just tolerate the fan noise as needed. :-/ Are you using Fog 4.1 or something earlier?

hhp

The problem can be worked around using tech note 15709 which is found at: [http://www.pyrus.com/downloads/FG4Technotes.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20080825145248/http:/www.pyrus.com/downloads/FG4Technotes.pdf "http://www.pyrus.com/downloads/FG4Technotes.pdf")
